message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this deal and we both walk away happy.
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, how about a more balanced split this time?
Bob, time is money. My last offer was generous, this one is fair. Don't get greedy!
Alice, let's be realistic.  My last offer was more than fair.  This is my final offer.
Bob, it's clear you're feeling the pressure.  Let's end this now before your share shrinks any further.
